name: FoodInsecurityInterventionsCPT
title: Food Insecurity Interventions CPT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent interventions for Food Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: In the FHIR Procedure and ServiceRequest resources, these values may be used for Procedure.code and ServiceRequest.code (e.g., for the SDOHCC Procedure and ServiceRequest profiles in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes CPT interventions for Food Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes included in the "Cross-Domains Interventions CPT" Value Set.)

concept.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; re-assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes
Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes

contains.display: Medical nutrition therapy; initial assessment and intervention, individual, face-to-face with the patient, each 15 minutes

Medical nutrition therapy; group (2 or more individual(s)), each 30 minutes
